name: The Ectoplasmic Distiller
tooltip:
The Ectoplasmic Distiller

Return to Mux Manascrambler in Gadgetzan with 1 Delicate Arcanite Converter, 4 Greater Eternal Essence, 10 Stonescale Oil, 25 Volcanic Ash and 40 gold.

Requirements:
- Delicate Arcanite Converter
- Greater Eternal Essence x 4
- Stonescale Oil x 10
- Volcanic Ash x 25
- Money:40
